topic: Comprehensive GitHub and Documentation Audit Completed
summary: Performed complete audit of all 15+ projects across /Users/MAC/Documents/projects including GitHub presence verification, documentation quality assessment, and missing elements identification. Found excellent GitHub coverage with all major projects having active repositories, strong documentation in most projects, but some gaps in professional elements like CONTRIBUTING.md files in newer projects.

Audited all projects for GitHub presence, documentation quality, and professional elements. Found 15 GitHub repos, 8/9 with excellent presence. Key gaps: No GitHub Wikis enabled, only 1/7 has GitHub Pages deployed, no npm packages published (but 3 PyPI packages live). Missing LICENSE files in 3 projects, missing CONTRIBUTING.md in 5 projects. Overall strong foundation with room for professional polish.
